alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms in portions of Wayne, southwestern Oakland, Livingston and northeastern Washtenaw Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 453 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fowlerville to near Pinckney to near Dixboro. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could damage unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ypsilanti and Dixboro around 500 PM EDT. Brighton and Hamburg around 505 PM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 515 PM EDT. Belleville around 520 PM EDT. Canton around 525 PM EDT. South Lyon around 530 PM EDT. Hartland around 535 PM EDT. Salem around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Melvindale, Commerce, Farmington Hills, Westland, Ecorse, Chilson, Wolverine Lake, Lincoln Park, Southgate and Wixom. People attending Founders Festival, and Yellowstone Country Music Festival should seek safe shelter as the storms approach! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
